L2_gloss:
snake
Huba mabuae.A snake bit me.

snake
Erike Hube abuae.A snake bit Enrique.

I, first person nominative pronoun
Inabeya iné hayate.I will run through the forest.
Arukobo iné obonoya.I want manioc.

my
Ma rahe hakaya.My brother runs.
Natu ma tatutuma iji minajara? [1]Granny, have you not seen my wives?

we, first person plural nominative pronoun
Sina sisiko oko narutera. [1]With whom will we go.
Osibu oko yabae nobotuma sina ribuae. [2]Some grandfathers said "we fished for morokoto".
